title: Tiger Analytics
text:
Worked as a Data Anayst in the Data Science Team Project on CPG -> Estimated the US dollar opportunity sales of particular emerging trends, the estimated price in the upcoming years using NLP and time forecasting.
Responsibilites: Helped the senior analysts with the Bigram,Trigrams, Data preprocessing and Topic Modelling Codes. Also helped to find the rising of prices of ingredients for a particular social event cause at a particular time period Regression and Classification models with a provided Product opportunity dataset

TECH STACK USED: Python, MSExcel, Power BI
